document.full_text: graeme mcdowell enjoyed a happy return to last year's ryder cup venue when the u.s. open champion fired a four-under 67 in the wales open first round at celtic manor on thursday.
document.title: mcdowell enjoys another good day at celtic manor
lines_and_colors: graeme mcdowell enjoyed a happy return to last year's ryder cup venue when the u.s. open champion fired a four-under 67 in the wales open first round at celtic manor on thursday.
